distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libnettle fixes the following security issues: 

- CVE-2015-8803: Fixed miscomputation bugs in secp-256r1 modulo functions. (bsc#964845)
- CVE-2015-8804: Fixed carry folding bug in x86_64 ecc_384_modp. (bsc#964847)
- CVE-2015-8805: Fixed miscomputation bugs in secp-256r1 modulo functions. (bsc#964849)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The ecc_256_modp function in ecc-256.c in Nettle before 3.2 does not properly handle carry propagation and produces incorrect output in its implementation of the P-256 NIST elliptic curve, which allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-8805.
notes.title: CVE description
